newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sigma Alimentos started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sigma Alimentos started.

text.p: Salomon Brothers said on Monday it started coverage of Mexican meat processor Sigma Alimentos SA de CV with a buy rating and a 12-month price target of 150 pesos.

-- Analyst Urban Larson said in a research note the company's shares had an attractive valuation and it was leveraging its extensive refrigerated distribution network to build market leadership in yogurt and cheese.
-- "The consumer recovery in Mexico should lead to accelerating growth in per capita consumption of processed meats and dairy products," Larson said.
-- The stock last traded at 119 pesos in Mexico.
